trans-unit.source: Converts a stream to a <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的資料流<xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個轉換器是否可以轉換指定的物件加入<xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation returns `true` only for a `sourceType` that is assignable to <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 這個實作會傳回`true`僅適用於`sourceType`，可指派給<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: All other `sourceType` types return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他`sourceType`類型都會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>代表您想要從轉換的類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified stream to a new <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的資料流轉換成新<xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The value for `context` must provide services for <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>, and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget>.
trans-unit.target: 值`context`必須提供服務給<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>， <xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider>， <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>，和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget>。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget> </xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory> </xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider> </xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>

trans-unit.source: The schema context when <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider> is queried must be an internally implemented XAML schema context that is particular for BAML usages.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述內容時<xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>查詢必須是特定 BAML 使用方式，在內部實作的 XAML 結構描述內容。</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>

trans-unit.source: This prevents most user code scenarios from using <xref:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止大部分的使用者程式碼案例使用<xref:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter>.</xref:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>要做為目前的文化特性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The source stream to convert.
trans-unit.target: 將來源資料流。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.DeferrableContent"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: context is .
trans-unit.target: contextis .

trans-unit.source: context is not able to provide the necessary XAML schema context for BAML.
trans-unit.target: context不能為 BAML 提供必要的 XAML 結構描述內容。

trans-unit.source: -or- service interpretation of context determines that the target object is not a .
trans-unit.target: -服務的解譯context判斷目標物件不是 。

trans-unit.source: -or- value is not a valid byte stream.
trans-unit.target: -或-value不是有效的位元組資料流。
